title: I Was a Teenage Nimrod
description: Fun, hilarity, murder and sex run rampant in a Northeast Ohio town. Private detective Mike Hardin and his well meaning assistant, Taylor Miilanavich, get caught up in yet another mess in 'I Was a Teenage Nimrod'. When 16 year old Benjamin Lykins runs away from his large (16 children) home and deserts his devout parents and their reality TV show 'Always Room for One More', he triggers a hurricane of events that results in murder and an abundance of religious hypocrisy.Before they know it, Mike & Taylor are up to their armpits in Bibles, bees, murder,hashish brownies, bombings, LSD, cannibals and crusading Christian demonstrators.Armed with only his suspicions and Taylor's hacking skills, Mike must attempt to save who he can in 'I Was a Teenage Nimrod (and all i got was a lousy t-shirt).
author: Hank Nimbus
